scripts.build: npm run lint && vue-tsc -b && vite build --base=https://test-b2b2c-assets.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/Scripts/admin-complementarios/admin-transfers/
scripts.builddev: npm run lint && vue-tsc -b && vite build --mode development --base=https://test-b2b2c-assets.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/Scripts/admin-complementarios/admin-transfers/
